# Empirical Strategy {#sec-empirical-strategy}

This chapter formalizes the estimation framework.

## 1. Baseline Model

$$
Y_{ut} = \beta \cdot D_{ut} + \alpha_u + \gamma_t + \varepsilon_{ut},
$$ {#eq-twfe-base}

where:

- $D_{ut}$ is the treatment indicator,
- $\alpha_u$ are unit fixed effects,
- $\gamma_t$ are year fixed effects,
- standard errors are clustered at {{cluster level}}.
